website_summaries.verdict: Once you find the size that will work for you, we think you'll love the comfort and performance these stylish golf shoes provide.
pros: A handsome, lightweight shoe that generates enthusiasm for the waterproof construction and Boost foam that provides comfort even after numerous rounds of golf
cons: Picking the right size can be challenging, as some men say they have a narrow fit

customer_reviews.title: This is hands down the most comfortable shoe of ANY kind I have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the most comfortable shoe of ANY kind I have ever worn. Super comfortable all day on the links. I initially bought the white color and liked it so much I purchased the black one. Fits very true to size and highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Good Judge

customer_reviews.title: i normally wear 9. 5, but bought 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: i normally wear 9.5, but bought 10. I think the 9.5 would have been ok because they are a little more generous in the width than some golf shoes
customer_reviews.author: W. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Shoe for Hot/Dry Conditions
customer_reviews.text: Tried on at a local store before purchasing. They fit true to size. Comfortable wear with a roomier toe box that other models. Light weight & breathable with good traction. I've had a couple of shots our of thicker rough where my back foot slipped, but over-all I recommend them for dry conditions. I walk/carry on the course and recommend these. I ended up buying a 2nd pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice spikeless golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are well made and grip real well even on muddy soil. They walk nicely and the memory foam feels good all day. They have kept my feet dry even on a boggy course and clean up nicely afterwards. I don’t like spikes anymore, so this turf shoe is really comfortable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: golfboy1954

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe - spikeless, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my hubby as a surprise, so took a gamble and didn't have him try on. I love the spikeless bottom - who wants to worry about replacing spikes?! They're very lightweight and not heavy like leather shoes can be. The look a little more dark charcoal gray than solid black, but that's ok.
customer_reviews.author: mrs_goatman

customer_reviews.title: True (golf) walking comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Walked three rounds with these shoes, wow, nothing but comfort I started walking back in January, have Adidas Tour 360’s, love the shoe but not good for walking, these shoes remind me of the cloud foam by adidas that I wear as my my go to casual sport shoe The fit is great, just like the cloud foam and after 72 holes walking my “dogs” we’re not barking Great walking show for golf!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LOOKING PERFECT FIT!!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great looking and fit perfectly true to size,very comfortable and the traction is very good. These bad boys were turning heads all day on the course and in the club house. I LIKE'EM ALOT!!! and you will too ; just pull the trigger you regret it or maybe you will, but if you do it's you not the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: RHINOHUNTER

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, lots of cushion.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, true to size. Traction as good as soft spike shoes at least on dry turf. Very comfortable but could use a little more forefoot support at the end of a round. Otherwise these are as comfortable as tennis shoes.
customer_reviews.author: THLuster

customer_reviews.title: Adidass Adipower s Boost golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: Product was one size too small and materials and construction appeared cheap.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very flashy and comfortable. No spikes, but made to still give you the grip you need. I love these other than they are white and get dirty easily.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Rodgers 4 Prez

customer_reviews.title: comfortable golf shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Played golf for nearly 45 years and never had a pair so comfortable. Off to Ireland and will be so glad to have them on my feet!
customer_reviews.author: JSD

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the quality!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are less expensive than your typical golf shoes, but very much still worth it. They are lightweight yet tough. Very comfortable with no irritation. I normally wear a 12 and the 12 fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable golf shoe I’ve ever worn. Great traction and waterproof. Toes stayed dry all day. I was originally concerned because I’ve always worn spikes, but these performed just as well and were much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Dewayne Hiers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value, Extremely Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Well made extremely comfortable shoes. I walked over 100 miles on the golf course in these and loved them. Still in great shape!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Really nice golf shoe. Comfortable but appears to be more durable than other "sneaker" type golf shoes. Worn them for about 5 rounds now...all in dry conditions. They seem like they would provide some weather protection but for dryness and traction, would recommend having another pair of more "traditional" golf shoes on hand for wet weather.
customer_reviews.author: JLV109

customer_reviews.title: Would buy these again
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and style. Very comfortable right out if the box. My third pair of golf shoes from Adidas and by far the best looking and comfortable. Priced right too.
customer_reviews.author: DuaneMR

customer_reviews.title: VERY comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Wore them 3 days after I received them. VERY comfortable right out of the box. Price was very good and delivery sooner than expected.
customer_reviews.author: TW - Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable and appear to be well made. They are also great looking as well. I could have purchased Nike’s for a little less but will never purchase another Nike product after the Betsy Ross flag debacle
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Boost 3 golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: A great looking shoe. High quality and fits perfectly. Impressive seller.
customer_reviews.author: J Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: the plastic fabric is like a tough vynil
customer_reviews.text: I can already tell these shoes will not last a Texas summer. My feet were burning up, the plastic fabric is like a tough vynil. The shoes are comfortable for walking an entire round of golf but, the fabric and the sun do not get along so well.
customer_reviews.author: C-Los

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe, traction not as good as a traditional spiked golf shoe but I expected that. You can wear these all day everyday. I also think they might run about a 1/2 size large, not a big problem.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable shoe. I was a bit concerned at first ...
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable shoe. I was a bit concerned at first due to the apparent stiffness in the shoe, however, I played 18 holes within two days after receiving shoes, no blisters, no pain, and the shoe did just what I expected the shoe to do
customer_reviews.author: Ray Parkhurst

customer_reviews.title: Poor Traction
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately- the spike-less traction is significantly weak. While comfortable to wear, the functionality of the shoe while in-use on fairway, greens, is insufficient. I wouldn't suggest this shoe for any geographic area that that has moisture.
customer_reviews.author: karel williams

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and comfortable golf shoe.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit well out of the box and they are comfortable. This is the second pair I purchased and I’m particularly pleased with how they repelled water. Additionally, they are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: James Miles

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, feels better
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome, they're my first pair of rubber spikes and I love walking the course in them
customer_reviews.author: mpmurphy

customer_reviews.title: Roomy Toebox
customer_reviews.text: seems like a well built shoe. toebox is generous, to generous for my feet. will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Fit is on par, looks are even better
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about spikeless non traditional golf shoes. These shoes took all those worries away. They fit wonderful and I keep just as much traction on the course without the worry of losing a spike. Not to mention I have gotten several compliments on the style and look of the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: MR. FAY

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable golf shoes out there. I've walked on the course twice with them and I can't say theyve helped my game, but at least I can't blame my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I normally take a US 12 but my last pair of Adidas were small so I ordered a 12.5 in this shoe. Fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Eastern Beaver

customer_reviews.title: Buy it in wide
customer_reviews.text: Length wise fit perfect. Wish I would gave bought the wide version. Look sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Forgensi

customer_reviews.title: Best spikeless golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my father. He loves them... Best shoes he ever had! He plays a lot and he is very heavy so he needs good support.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. They’re lightweight and they’ve got many miles on them already from walking the courses!
customer_reviews.author: Erik A.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my fiancé, and he loves them and says they’re so comfortable 👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: hales_5

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable shoe - definitely a great shoe if you are walking the course
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my husband and he says they are everything he has come to expect from Adidas. He enjoys the style, comfort, fit etc ... It also helps that they come in a large enough size for him.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Way too small !
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is way, way, too small even though I ordered the same size I always order without issues. Unusable. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: redrock

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the fit, and how light this shoe is to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Consider this golf shoe for your next pair
customer_reviews.text: The fit is precise. Spikeless is here to stay. Walking and playing like a comfortable pair of shoes
customer_reviews.author: John P. Kaelblein

customer_reviews.title: They are the most comfortable golf shoes I've worn and have kept my socks ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are worth the cost. I have purchased 2 pairs now and will be getting a 3rd. They are the most comfortable golf shoes I've worn and have kept my socks dry in the morning dew.
customer_reviews.author: PWM3

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe, walked 9 holes on a very hilly course when I got them and feet felt fine after Great grip and support Highly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Dave C.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are eye-catching golf shoes with terrific cushioning. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A solid pair of golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: My 1st time trying spikeless golf shoe and this shoe perform very well, I did not noticed any slip and I played a tournament in the morning with grass still wet and its waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: looks and feels great.
customer_reviews.text: I want a golf shoe that I don't have to "feel" while i'm playing. Discomfort is a big detraction from the game. I am very happy with these for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Jodoin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoes. Fit perfect, normal size. They feel good.
customer_reviews.author: pvs17

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING SHOES FOR GOLF
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend wears the shoes every time he goes to play golf, in fact he throw away the old ones he had, now he loves these and are their favorite shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Montenegro

customer_reviews.title: A good deal!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, light weight. Played a round in them this weekend and felt great. Excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: Brian MV

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful, yet a bit small
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair of shoes for my brother. They are beautiful, yet a bit small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable and durable golf shoes I have worn
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable and durable golf shoes I have worn. The boost foam slightly yellows after significant use, but they remain water proof and in tact. I used them for over 200 rounds of caddying on steep terrain, in all conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected, really gripped the ground as if they were spiked and they truly are water proof, I played the day after it rained and my feet stayed 💯% dry. Also the comfort is top notch, definitely worth the 90
customer_reviews.author: Zach F

customer_reviews.title: Not Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are hard on the feet and not as comfortable compared to addidias' other styles.
customer_reviews.author: Great Falls

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Amazing golf shoe, however does not compare to ultra boost sneakers. Hard to beat for the price point though.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: I liked the true fit of the shoe. I haven’t had the opportunity to wear during wet conditions. Looking forward to seeing how dry they keep my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just What the Doctor Ordered
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this shoe. It fits well, looks great and performs on the green - birdie, birdie!.
customer_reviews.author: Beyond Frustrated

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite golf shoes! I love that they are spikeless and they feel so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Best golf shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: Adidas really outdone themselves with this golf shoes best shoes ever!!! Really comfortable right out of the box walked 36 holes no problem
customer_reviews.author: Mark Day

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: You can walk 18 holes the first time you put them on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these golf shoes thinking about buying another pair for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jagerrand

customer_reviews.title: They have a good heel support bit I will put them under the ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit perfectly and are visually pleasing. They have a good heel support but I will put them under the test of the course soon to get a proper impression.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy Becker

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great golf shoes! My husband loved them. Would get another color.
customer_reviews.author: M.Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable golf shoe I have ever put on my feet! And the look is sure sexy!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Guerette

customer_reviews.title: ... little larger than expected but the shoe is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: It was a little larger than expected but the shoe is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable golf shoes I've ever worn. The boost technology is almost revolutionary.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Golfing in comfort
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and good fit. Now if they would only improve the golf game...
customer_reviews.author: Rich in DC

customer_reviews.title: He loved them, perfect true to size fit
customer_reviews.text: Father's Day gift for my husband, from my kids! He loved them, perfect true to size fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great spikeless golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and wearing shoe. I wear it as an everday shoe if I want to.
customer_reviews.author: MARK CLEMONS

customer_reviews.title: With it!
customer_reviews.text: Good heel and toe support. Very comfortable and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: WMB3

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit well and comfortable just put them on and played
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. This is my second pair. Very comfortable to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: J Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable. I first tried a pair of Ecco golf ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable. I first tried a pair of Ecco golf shoes, which were not as comfortable and didn't fit as well as these Adidas did.
customer_reviews.author: Difficult to Please

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: The Adipower Boost 3 is a very comfortable golf shoe - have played 4 rounds in them - best golf shoe that I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Style, Look and Feel
customer_reviews.text: Style and fit was exactly as expected. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mdiaz

customer_reviews.title: Played in rain first time used and no issues with soggy feet
customer_reviews.text: Good looking , durable and comfortable golf shoe. Usually bought footjoy brand but now found another quality gold shoe!
customer_reviews.author: dan camacho

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable! Great golf shoe. Only wish it made me play better!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Ratner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Fast international delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! I love this one! Fast delivery! Only 5 days to deliver here at Manila!
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Bautista

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Quality looks like very good. Size is 80% as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad Abou Ajwi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and comfortable. Got a compliment before I made it to the first tee.
customer_reviews.author: TWL

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months the lining in the heal area ripped causing terrible blister. Not able to wear them after tbat.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product as anticipated and fit as expected. High quality product and service. Delivery as expected.
customer_reviews.author: daniel t. green

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ended up ordering a half size bigger after reading reviews that said the shoe fits somewhat small. At 1st it was somewhat loose in the toe box since I have narrow feet. I replaced the insole with Superfeet Green insoles and now the shoes fit perfectly. Since I suffer from plantar fasciitis, I always wear Superfeet or Spenco insoles for pain free golfing. I am also very happy with the firm fit of the heel box. Very stable golf shoe with lots of cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Capo cannoniere

customer_reviews.title: Said they were the most comfortable sneaker he has worn and wish they were actual ...
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend raved about them for his golf trips. Said they were the most comfortable sneaker he has worn and wish they were actual sneakers. These are cheaper than the other sites too which I love!
customer_reviews.author: Carly Rae

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoe. Runs a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Cool shoes but had to return because they were a little on small size for me
customer_reviews.author: onetallguy123

customer_reviews.title: Fit, feel, comfort, and sharp lookin!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best golf shoes I've owned yet. My main motivator in purchasing these was that my feet would hurt after playing in my previous Nike golf shoes, so I was looking for something with soft spikes that you could walk 18 holes with and be comfortable in. Shoes certainly exceeded my expectations and furthermore look killer too! Let's hope these can last a while! 4/24 update: I played 36 holes this weekend with these shoes and couldn't be more pleased with the comfort on these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Bill BTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes but they run small
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes but they run small. I got the same size as I wear in tour 360's and these are a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: VERY COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: Great walking shoe. They were brand new and I walked 27 holes easily. VERY COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.author: Dean Coons

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. To bed is wider than normal and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: LCD

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe but not the same as my other Adidas golf shoes.
customer_reviews.author: nick s

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It is not golf shoes to keep balance is problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mukesh

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Adipower s Boost 3 Onix/C Golf Shoe
feature_bullets: 80% One Piece Textile Upper/20% Climastorm Microfiber Leather
Boost midsole cushioning for walking comfort and energy return, Slightly rounded toe
Climaproof stretch microfiber leather offers durability, protection, and lightweight comfort with easy care
6-spike tpu outsole construction with strategically placed secondary lugs for tour-proven grip and stability
Directly welded energy sling to guide energy transfer and prevent power leaks
Molded eva tongue top delivers a more precise, comfortable fit. Heel lift: 9 mm (UK size 8.5)
